Did you notice that checking "stage only" in the resources (fuel/monopropelant ect) menu does not work anymore? Even I check this I cna see all the fuel left and not the amount left in current stage ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) Anybody know how to fix it?

Avantar
I think this is due in large part to how your craft is constructed. I believe that it only counts verticle stages, not horizontal ones.
